title: Possessive Italian Neighbor
description: She’s been mine since the first moment I saw her.  I’m her possessive Italian neighbor, watching her from the window of my apartment next door.  I’m an Italian older man obsessed with this younger woman from abroad. It’s the first time I’ve ever felt this way, and I’m going to make her mine and claim her from Lake Como to Tuscany and everywhere in-between.  It’s her first time in Italy, and I’m going to be her first, and last, for life.  And I won’t stop until she’s pregnant with my baby, so the whole world knows she’s mine, no matter who tries to stop us.  *Possessive Italian Neighbor is an insta-everything standalone instalove romance with an HEA, no cheating, and no cliffhanger.
author: Flora Ferrari
